name: Participate in paid research to help make VPN better

message.title: Participate in paid research to help make VPN better
message.subtitle: This study will take place in April 2023, and you could receive up to $200 USD (or the equivalent in your local currency) as our thanks for your time and feedback.

blocks.content: We’re exploring ways to enhance the Mozilla VPN experience and want to hear your thoughts.
This research can be completed right from your home computer.
If you’re interested, please take a short survey. We’ll review your responses and follow up with you if you’re selected.

content.content: If you are invited to the study, you will be asked to log in to our research platform and complete 2-3 short activities. We estimate that it will take about 30 minutes of your time to complete them all, and you would be compensated $60.
Approximately half of our participants will be invited to join a 90-minute online focus group the following week, for an additional $140.

blocks.content: Thanks for helping us improve Mozilla VPN!
